thread.title: BAHAHA! Ted Cruz tweets tribute to snowflakes everywhere, breaks Twitter (video)
thread.title_full: BAHAHA! Ted Cruz tweets tribute to snowflakes everywhere, breaks Twitter (video)

author: Sam J.
title: BAHAHA! Ted Cruz tweets tribute to snowflakes everywhere, breaks Twitter (video)
text:
He loved it so much that he shared it as a tribute to snowflakes everywhere. 
Via PolitiChicks : 
Two comedian country stars decided to make a (hilarious) stance for conservatives in America. “Friends in Safe Spaces” is the conservative political spin on the Garth Brooks song “Friends in Low Places” by Chad Prather and Steve “Mudflap” McGrew. 
“Blame it all on our roots, we never wore boots, we never once played in the streets. Feel very bitter, got news off of Twitter, we just can’t handle defeat. I got friends in safe spaces, if you don’t go with us then you must be racist, that’s our catch phase. Where’s our latte?” 
As you can imagine, there were angry snowflakes all over Cruz’s tweet: @tedcruz Did a real politician just use the term 'snowflake'? Way to have respect for all people, Ted. Enjoy your (hopefully) last term. 
— Josh Hortin (@JoshHortin) March 16, 2017 
W h. We’d include more of their tweets but honestly they all sound alike this so why bother? 
And sheesh, when did people lose their sense of humor? 
Oh yeah, they’d have to have one first to lose it.
